home.title: Let's Build Your Website
home.subtitle: Tell us about your business and what you need. No technical knowledge required.

thankYou.title: Thank you!
thankYou.message: We've received your enquiry and will be in touch soon to discuss your project.
thankYou.step3: We'll discuss options that match your needs

involvement.title: How hands-on do you want to be?
involvement.subtitle: This affects how we work together and what you'll pay for ongoing changes.
involvement.accountManagementPrompt: For things like buying a domain, setting up hosting, or managing logins—how would you like to handle that?

complexity.title: What kind of website do you need?

corePages.title: What pages do you need?
corePages.otherPlaceholder: e.g., Custom landing pages, Partner page...

dynamicFeatures.title: What do you need to regularly update or manage?

advancedFeatures.title: What advanced features do you need?
advancedFeatures.otherPlaceholder: e.g., Custom API integrations, Auction system...

aiFeatures.title: Are you interested in AI-powered features?
aiFeatures.subtitle: These can be added to any type of website.

yourBusiness.title: Tell us about your business
yourBusiness.businessDescriptionPlaceholder: For example: I run a small bakery in Manchester. We make fresh bread, pastries, and custom cakes for special occasions. We've been in business for 3 years.

competitors.label: Who are your competitors?
competitors.helper: Share up to 3 competitor websites so we understand your market.

inspiration.label: Any websites you like the look of?
inspiration.helper: Can be the same as a competitor, or completely different.
inspiration.reasonLabel: What do you like about it?
inspiration.reasonPlaceholder: e.g. the layout, colours, how it feels, specific features...

designAssets.title: What materials do you have ready?
designAssets.subtitle: Anything you don't have, we can help create — but design work is quoted separately from the website build.
designAssets.note: Any assets marked "No" or "I need help" may require additional design or copywriting work, quoted separately from the website build.

contactInfo.title: Last step — how do we reach you?
contactInfo.preferredContact: How would you prefer we contact you?

pricingSummary.title: Your Estimated Quote
pricingSummary.subtitle: Based on your selections, here's what you can expect to invest.

pricing.basePriceOnly: Base price only — no add-ons selected
pricing.contentNeedsTitle: Additional Design/Content Work May Be Needed
pricing.contentNeedsNote: These are quoted separately from the website build.
pricing.disclaimer: This is an estimate based on your selections. Your final quote will be provided after we discuss your project in detail.

doItForMe.label: Do it for me
doItForMe.description: You handle everything. I tell you what I want, you make it happen. I contact you for any changes.

teachMeBasics.label: Teach me the basics
teachMeBasics.description: Set things up, but show me how to do simple updates myself (like adding posts or changing text).

guideMe.label: Guide me through it
guideMe.description: I want to do it myself, but I need help when I get stuck. Maybe a call or two.

accountManagement.youManage: You manage everything in your accounts, I don't need access
accountManagement.myNameYouSetup: Set them up in my name, but you do the setup
accountManagement.walkMeThrough: Walk me through it so I own and understand it

simpleStatic.label: Simple & static
simpleStatic.description: A clean online presence. People find you, see what you do, and contact you. Content rarely changes.

someMovingParts.label: Some moving parts
someMovingParts.description: Everything above, plus you'll regularly add content or need interactive elements.

fullFeatured.label: Full-featured
fullFeatured.description: Everything above, plus manage products, payments, bookings, members, or other advanced needs.

advancedFeatures.integrations: Integration with external tools (Zapier, Mailchimp, etc.)

aiFeatures.chatbot: Chatbot that answers visitor questions automatically
aiFeatures.assistant: AI assistant that helps customers find products/services
aiFeatures.contactForm: Smart contact form (AI triages, categorises, or auto-responds)
aiFeatures.content: Content generation help (AI writes drafts for your blog/products)
aiFeatures.notSure: Not sure — tell me more later
